body:
Adds the IceT compositing library from Sandia/Kitware. Most default functionality needed for image compositing is added, OpenGL acceleration for very large displays is disabled.

### Downstream usage

Most VTK based software which supports parallel image compositing, such as VisIt, Paraview and in our use-case [ISAAC](https://github.com/ComputationalRadiationPhysics/isaac).

### Related Issues

#2290

also, the version number in the download is quite odd in terms of our detection... (`2-1` is actually `2-1-1` aka `2.1.1` but that would not discover the download correctly...)

an other weird fact: in-source (header defines) this release says it's `2.2.0` but that's the 2012 release, tag and tarball we live with...
title: Packages: Add IceT
